title: Luxury House for Sale in Nugegoda
details:
Architect designed house offering extensive living space along with a total of five bedrooms and four bathrooms. The house features a spacious garden, two large living areas on the ground and first floor and a bright and spacious pantry with fitted cupboards & built-in essential appliances.

The master bedroom sits on the first floor, thoughtfully designed with plenty of closet space and a spacious master bathroom including a bath & rain shower. Additionally there are three more bedrooms on the 1st floor and a guest bedroom with an en-suite bathroom on the ground floor. A well configured, beautifully designed family house in an impressive and convenient location.

- Five bedrooms, four bathrooms. Three of which are en suite.
- Spacious living & dining room.
- Marble flooring.
- All bedrooms are equipped with A/C
- Outdoor bar lounge and indoor TV lounge.
- Large fitted pantry with a 5 burner cooker & oven.
- Separate maids and drivers quarters.
- Solar hot water heating system.
- Electric gate with parking for multiple vehicles.

Price negotiable upon inspection. Viewings can be arranged by appointment only.
